Struct.name: <a>
Struct.about: Link. href='addres' or href=#id. target='_blank' (new tab).

Presentation.name: <b>
Presentation.about: Bold. Elements are presented in visually different way.

Presentation.name: <i>
Presentation.about: Italic. Elements are presented in visually different way.

Presentation.name: <sup>
Presentation.about: Superscript. Elements are presented as expoents.

Semantic.name: <em>
Semantic.about: Indicates changes that subtly changes the meaning of a sentence.

Semantic.name: <blockquote>
Semantic.about:
Quotation. Normally used for longer quotes that take up a paragraph.

is used inside

. Atribute - cite='(fonte)'.

Semantic.name: <cite>
Semantic.about: Citation of a peace of work.

Semantic.name: <dfn>
Semantic.about: Definiton. First time explaining some new terminology.

Semantic.name: <address>
Semantic.about: Contain contact detail for the author of the page

Semantic.name: <del>
Semantic.about: To show content that has been deleted

Semantic.name: <ins>
Semantic.about: To show content that has been inserted

Semantic.name: <s>
Semantic.about: To show content that is no more relevent or ccurate but should not me removed.

Table.name: <ol>
Table.about: Ordered List. Used with <li> - List Item -.

Table.name: <ul>
Table.about: Unordered List. Used with <lu> - List Item -.

Table.name: <dl>
Table.about: Definition list. List that contain Terms and their definitions. Used with <dt> and <dd>.

Table.name: <dt>
Table.about: Defined Term. Term to be defined.
